services.description: Expert billing support for psychiatrists, therapists, and mental health providers.
challenges: Managing time-based coding and session duration
Claim denials for missing documentation or authorization
Minor billing details regarding psychologists vs. psychiatrists
solutions: Accurate CPT/ICD coding and documentation review
Prior authorization and verification workflows
Specialty-driven workflows for psychologists and psychiatrists

faqs.question: What mental health specialties do you support?
faqs.answer: We provide billing services for psychologists, psychiatrists, therapists (LCSWs, LPCs, LMFTs), and behavioral health clinics across the U.S.

faqs.question: How do you handle time-based therapy billing?
faqs.answer: We ensure accurate CPT code selection and documentation review for all time-based psychotherapy sessions, including 90832, 90834, and 90837.

faqs.question: Can you bill both therapy and med management for the same day?
faqs.answer: Yes. We ensure proper modifier usage and payer-specific guidelines to bill therapy and psychiatry services on the same date.

faqs.question: Do you support mental health billing for telehealth?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We follow payer-specific telehealth policies and use appropriate POS codes and modifiers for virtual visits.

faqs.question: What EHRs are you compatible with?
faqs.answer: We integrate with most mental health EHRs, including TheraNest, SimplePractice, Valant, TherapyNotes, and others.

services.description: Specialized billing support for behavioral health and substance use providers.
challenges: Complex coding for behavioral interventions and SUD
Denials due to unclear documentation or level of care
Inconsistent payer rules across behavioral health services
solutions: Accurate CPT/ICD coding for all behavioral health levels
Templates for IOP, PHP, and SUD documentation compliance
Payer-specific edits and denial prevention workflows

faqs.question: What services are included in behavioral health billing?
faqs.answer: We handle coding, claims, eligibility checks, A/R, and payer compliance for therapy, psychiatry, IOPs, and substance use programs.

faqs.question: What’s the difference between mental and behavioral health billing?
faqs.answer: Behavioral health billing includes mental health services plus substance use, behavioral therapy, and broader interventions.

faqs.question: Do you work with behavioral health clinics and solo therapists?
faqs.answer: Yes. We support all types, from single therapists to large group practices and IOP programs.

faqs.question: Can you help with behavioral health billing software setup?
faqs.answer: We integrate with major systems like TheraNest, TherapyNotes, Valant, and more.

faqs.question: What makes your billing solutions different?
faqs.answer: Our behavioral health billing services are compliance-driven, specialty-specific, and focused on increasing collections.

faqs.question: What services do you bill for clinical psychologists?

faqs.question: Do you help with time-based coding and CPT modifiers?
faqs.answer: Yes. We apply correct codes and modifiers for session duration and test scoring time.

faqs.question: How do you support psychological testing billing?
faqs.answer: We ensure coding for test administration, scoring, interpretation, and report writing is accurate and compliant.

faqs.question: Are your services suitable for solo psychology practices?

faqs.question: Which EHRs do you support?

services.description: Accurate and compliant billing for chiropractic practices of all sizes.

Payer-specific chiropractic billing protocols

faqs.question: What’s included in your chiropractic billing services?
faqs.answer: We offer coding, claims submission, modifier usage, payment posting, and denial follow-up.

faqs.question: How do you handle billing for maintenance care?
faqs.answer: We use the correct modifiers (GA, GY, GZ) and ensure documentation supports the care level.

faqs.question: Do you work with small chiropractic offices?
faqs.answer: Yes. We support solo providers, wellness clinics, and high-volume practices.

faqs.question: Are you familiar with chiropractic medical billing software?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with popular systems like ChiroTouch, Genesis, and Jane.

faqs.question: What makes your chiropractic billing solutions different?
faqs.answer: We offer niche expertise, fast turnaround, and tailored support for chiropractors.

faqs.question: What services are covered under family practice billing?
faqs.answer: We bill for preventive care, immunizations, acute illness visits, E/M services, chronic care management, and wellness screenings.

faqs.question: Do you support rural and multi-provider clinics?
faqs.answer: Yes. We offer billing solutions for solo family doctors, multi-provider clinics, Rural Health Clinics (RHCs), and FQHCs.

faqs.question: How do you help with E/M coding?
faqs.answer: We apply accurate E/M levels based on time or medical decision-making and audit documentation to ensure compliance.

faqs.question: Are you a family practice medical billing company?
faqs.answer: Yes. Ardur Healthcare offers end-to-end revenue cycle management for primary care providers and clinics of all sizes.

faqs.question: What makes your billing services different?

faqs.question: What services do you cover under home health billing?
faqs.answer: We bill for skilled nursing, physical therapy, occupational therapy, speech therapy, home health aide visits, and more.

faqs.question: Do you handle CPT coding for home visits?
faqs.answer: Yes. We use correct CPT codes for home visits (e.g., 99341–99350) and HCPCS codes based on visit type.

faqs.question: What makes your home health billing services different?
faqs.answer: We specialize in home health billing, understand PDGM billing cycles, and align claims with OASIS, POC, and visit documentation.

faqs.question: Do you support both Medicare and private payers?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We handle Medicare Part A home health billing, Medicaid programs, and commercial payers.

faqs.question: Can you work with our home health software?
faqs.answer: Yes. We integrate with platforms like Kinnser, WellSky, Axxess, and others.

services.description: Specialized billing for foot and ankle care, wound treatment, and diabetic services.

Incorrect use of Q modifiers (Q7–Q9)

solutions: Medical necessity checks and ICD-10 validation

faqs.question: What services do you bill under podiatry?
faqs.answer: We bill for diabetic foot care, wound debridement, nail procedures, office visits, injections, and minor surgeries.

faqs.question: How do you manage Q-modifier usage in podiatry billing?
faqs.answer: We apply Q7, Q8, or Q9 modifiers based on qualifying diagnoses and physical findings.

faqs.question: Are you familiar with podiatry billing software?
faqs.answer: Yes. We work with podiatry-specific EHRs like TRAKnet, SammyEHR, and others.

faqs.question: What makes your podiatry billing services different?
faqs.answer: We specialize in podiatry billing, maintain compliance with LCD/NCD rules, and improve first-pass claim acceptance rates.

faqs.question: Do you offer billing services for podiatry groups and surgery centers?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We handle billing for group practices and outpatient surgery centers with scalable workflows and custom reporting.

services.description: Accurate billing for complex wounds, debridement procedures, and chronic care.
challenges: Confusion around depth and type of debridement
Denials due to inadequate documentation or diagnosis
Improper use of modifiers and site-specific codes
solutions: Detailed code assignment for procedure depth and method
Documentation templates aligned with payer guidelines
Modifier support (59, 25, RT/LT) for multi-site billing accuracy

faqs.question: What procedures are covered under wound care billing?
faqs.answer: We bill for selective and excisional debridement, dressing changes, wound assessments, skin substitutes, and complex chronic wound care.

faqs.question: How do you ensure accurate coding for wound care?
faqs.answer: Our team assigns codes based on the wound’s depth, location, and method of treatment, ensuring proper modifier use and payer compliance.

faqs.question: Do you support billing for recurring wound care visits?
faqs.answer: Yes. We track frequencies, apply correct date-of-service logic, and support billing for weekly or multiple visits per month.

faqs.question: What makes your wound care billing services different?
faqs.answer: We focus specifically on wound care billing, understand CPT codes, and proactively review documentation to reduce denials.

faqs.question: Do you help with billing audits or overpayment issues?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We assist with payer audits, retroactive documentation reviews, and resolving overpayment or underpayment concerns.

services.description: Accurate insurance billing for therapeutic massage and bodywork providers.
challenges: Limited coverage for massage therapy services
Incorrect CPT code use or missing documentation
Payer denials due to unclear medical necessity
solutions: Verification of payer policies and plan coverage
Use of correct CPT codes and modifier combinations
Documentation templates aligned with insurance standards

faqs.question: Can massage therapy be billed to insurance?
faqs.answer: Yes, if the service is medically necessary and covered by the payer. We verify eligibility and ensure documentation meets insurance standards.

faqs.question: What CPT codes are used for massage therapy billing?
faqs.answer: The most common codes are 97124 (therapeutic massage) and 97140 (manual therapy), depending on the service and diagnosis.

faqs.question: How do you help prove medical necessity?
faqs.answer: We provide documentation templates and help ensure your notes, referrals, and diagnosis codes justify the treatment for coverage.

faqs.question: Can I bill massage therapy under another provider’s NPI?
faqs.answer: In integrated clinics, yes, such as billing under a chiropractor or physical therapist if allowed. We can guide you on the proper billing structure.

faqs.question: Do you support out-of-network or cash-based massage therapy billing?
faqs.answer: Yes. We can generate superbills for patients or process OON claims for those seeking insurance reimbursement.

our_solutions: Timed coding audits to ensure unit accuracy

cta.description: Request a quote and let us simplify your physical therapy billing, from time tracking to Medicare rules and modifier management.

process: Insurance Verification: Confirm coverage, therapy limits, and authorization.
Documentation Review: Ensure plan of care and therapy goals meet payer criteria.
Code Assignment: Time-based and service-based CPT code entry with modifier logic.
Claim Submission: Clean claims filed electronically with GP modifier accuracy.
Payment Posting: Track patient payments, deductibles, and payer reimbursements.
Denial Management: Appeal rejections related to therapy caps or code conflicts.

who_we_serve.intro: At Ardur Healthcare, we support a wide range of physical therapy providers, including independent PT clinics, hospital-based rehab departments, SNF contract therapists, and mobile therapy units. We understand that physical therapy billing involves more than just coding; it’s about navigating Medicare limitations, modifier usage, documentation compliance, and timed CPT services. We integrate with physical therapy EMRs like WebPT, PromptEMR, Tebra (Kareo), and more, ensuring seamless claim workflows and revenue improvement. Our clients consistently experience higher clean claim rates, faster reimbursement, and fewer compliance issues.
types: Private PT Practices: Time-tracked billing for therapeutic exercise, neuromuscular reeducation, and manual therapy
Outpatient Rehab Centers: Billing for multiple disciplines and complex modality tracking
SNF and Contract Therapists: Therapy billing under consolidated billing and payer-specific rules
Pediatric & Geriatric Therapy: Age-specific billing with modifier logic and documentation support
Home-Based PT Providers: Coordination with home health plans and therapy caps

faqs.question: What CPT codes do you handle in physical therapy billing?
faqs.answer: We manage codes like 97110, 97112, 97140, 97530, 97035, and others, accurately distinguishing between time-based and modality procedures.

faqs.question: How do you ensure compliance with Medicare therapy billing?
faqs.answer: We monitor cap thresholds, apply the KX modifier when necessary, and ensure documentation supports medical necessity and plan-of-care updates.

faqs.question: Can you integrate with my EMR like WebPT or PromptEMR?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with most leading physical therapy EMRs, ensuring a smooth data flow and claim processing experience.

faqs.question: What modifiers are required for PT billing?
faqs.answer: GP is essential for PT services. We also manage modifier 59 for distinct services and KX for therapy cap exceptions when needed.

faqs.question: Do you help with audits or Medicare overpayment issues?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We support clients through payer audits, review documentation gaps, and ensure compliance to prevent overpayments or penalties.
